meanings.definition: A nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory drug used to treat pain and inflammation.
meanings.sent1: My doctor prescribed naproxen for my back pain.
meanings.sent2: She bought naproxen at the pharmacy for her sore knee.
meanings.sent3: The naproxen bottle danced on the shelf, ready to help with pain.
meanings.sent4: Naproxen is like a superhero fighting against inflammation in the body.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue naproxen pills were like tiny soldiers ready to battle pain.

meanings.definition: To take naproxen for relief of pain.
meanings.sent1: I will naproxen after dinner to ease my headache.
meanings.sent2: She naproxens every morning for her arthritis.
meanings.sent3: The cat naproxened gracefully after a long day of napping.
meanings.sent4: He naproxened his way through the tough workout, feeling better afterwards.
meanings.sent5: Naproxening before bedtime helps me sleep without pain waking me up.
